titleStmt.title: A declaration and vindication of the Lord Mayor, aldermen and commons of the City of London in Common-councell assembled. Ordered at a Common-Councel holden in the chamber of the Guild-hall of the City of London the 30 day of April 1660. that this declaration and vindication be forthwith printed and published. Sadler.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher, printer to the Honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Goldsmiths' Library, London.
